publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4147 Bill Wilson: The Advanced Forming Research Centre—That the Parliament welcomes the announcement of the establishment of the Advanced Forming Research Centre in Inchinnan, Renfrewshire, the first of its kind in the United Kingdom; recognises that the centre will research and develop innovative technology for the aerospace, energy, marine and car industries; commends the collaboration between the University of Strathclyde, Scottish Enterprise and leading engineering firms on creating the centre, and recognises the funding that the Scottish Government has provided to keep Scotland at the forefront of the development of such technology. Supported by: Kenneth Gibson*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Rob Gibson*, Bill Kidd*

S3M-4147 Bill Wilson: The Advanced Forming Research Centre—That the Parliament welcomes the announcement of the establishment of the Advanced Forming Research Centre in Inchinnan, Renfrewshire, the first of its kind in the United Kingdom; recognises that the centre will research and develop innovative technology for the aerospace, energy, marine and car industries; commends the collaboration between the University of Strathclyde, Scottish Enterprise and leading engineering firms on creating the centre, and recognises the funding that the Scottish Government has provided to keep Scotland at the forefront of the development of such technology. Supported by: Kenneth Gibson, Joe FitzPatrick, Rob Gibson, Bill Kidd
S3M-4147 The Advanced Forming Research Centre (lodged on 14 May 2009) Gil Paterson*, Jamie Hepburn*
